word: H898 - בָּגַד - bâgad - baw-gad' - Deal deceitfully

sections.paragraph: துரோகம் பண்ணு, துரோகி, பாதகர், அக்கிரமஞ்செய், மோசம்பண்ணு. துரோகம் செய், துரோகியாகு - வினைச்சொல்
to act treacherously, deceitfully, to deal treacherouslx (Qal) to act or to deal treacherously, faithlessly, deceitfully, to offend

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: A primitive root; to cover (with a garment); figuratively to act covertly; by implication to pillage: - deal deceitfully (treacherously, unfaithfully), offend, transgress (-or), (depart), treacherous (dealer, -ly, man), unfaithful (-ly, man), X very.
Cognate: H898, H899, H900, H901, H902, H903, H904, H906, H908
